result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Timothy G Sacho

records.addlTxt: 3:03 PM Defendant Timothy G Sacho not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Brenda L. Yaskal in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court states defendant called stating he had transportation issues, State requesting motion be denied, Court denies all defendant's motions, 3:12 P.M.
filed by defendant requesting reset for the 10/4/22 hearing; Court denied

Pre-trial conference on October 31, 2022 at 01:10 pm.
Return date on November 16, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Motion hearing on October 4, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
filed by defendant - motion to dismiss and motion to reduce the bond amount
for a pretrial conference 10/31/22 at 1:10 P.M. and return date 11/16/22 at 10:00 A.M.

10:34 AM Defendant Timothy G Sacho in court.  Prosecuting attorney Margeret Anne Sorrentino in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews petition for appointment of counsel, Defendant does need to contact the Public Defender's Office for qualification, if defendant calls and is not eligible for a Public Defender, the Court would appoint counsel, Once defendant contacts the Public Defender's Office, the defendant is to have the Public Defender's Office notify the Court of the eligibility status, Defendant requesting amendment of bond, Court states no motion has been filed at this time
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 01:10 pm.
Return date scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Defendants request denied.  Tried to contact to let him know.  Number provided on request was not his and other number on CCap was disconnected.
Request to Appear Remotely - filed by defendant; denied.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Not be on the premises of Veterans memorial Park in Wis. Dells, WI. Standard felony conditions.
Pretrial 8-15-22 at 2:30 PM and Return date 8-31-22 at 10:00 AM

1:35 PM Prosecuting attorney Margaret Anne Sorrentino in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Timothy G Sacho appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Melville Peter Middleton II appeared by video for Timothy G Sacho. Waived reading of complaint. Advisement of rights. Bond recommendations. Court set $5000.00 signature bond. Not be on the premises of Veterans Memorial Park in Wis. Dells. Standard felony conditions. Time limits for preliminary hearing waived. 1:42 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
